title: expose "Edit->Reset Model Poses" to a ROS message/service

content.raw: it would be convenient if one could send a ROS message/service call to Gazebo to reset the world and/or model poses. Then, one could reset the world, wait a few seconds, and then run one's script(s) to test various controllers or trajectories. This can already be done through various other techniques like linking against gazebo transports (?) but it would be more obvious to n00bs like me if there was just a ros message(s) for "reset models" or whatever.
